original_text: Therefore the men of Jabesh said, “Tomorrow we will give ourselves up to you, and you may do to us whatever seems good to you.”
korean_text: 야베스 사람들이 이에 이르되 우리가 내일 너희에게 나아가리니 너희 생각에 좋을 대로 우리에게 다 행하라 하니라

sentences.original_text: Therefore the men of Jabesh said,
Tomorrow we will give ourselves up to you,
and you may do to us whatever seems good to you.
